Roberto Pires - IT Professional Services

Welcome to My Portfolio
I'm Roberto Pires, a passionate Computer Science and IT educator with over 20 years of international experience.

I specialise in teaching KS3 to A-level Computer Science, BTEC IT, and Creative iMedia. I've led departments, coordinated digital media projects, and delivered courses at both secondary and further education levels across the UK and Portugal.

This portfolio showcases my qualifications, certifications, professional experience, and the services I offer in tutoring, teaching, and IT consultancy.
